amendment.description: To establish the Denali Access System in the State of Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2498 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2498 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1240) To establish the Denali Access System in the State of Alaska.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2498 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2498 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2285.
